title: Printing personal font collection speciment sheet
content:
I'd like to print out samples of all the fonts in my local collection so I can throw them up on a wall. Ideally I would have control over what the sample text is and how many fonts are displayed on a single page.

Is there any OSX software that has this feature or a stand-alone utility that does this?

Thanks ahead of time.
author: Lokesh

comments.content:
Fontmatrix does a pretty good job. And it's free.  
 [http://fontmatrix.net/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131019160845/http:/fontmatrix.net/ "http://fontmatrix.net/")
